source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_00<tab>Broken Mountain is steeling himself for the decisive battle.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_00<tab>Broken Mountain semble prêt à partir au combat.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_01<tab>Broken Mountain informs you that the Sahagin have begun their assault on the tidegates. Although Curious Gorge remains doubtful about his ability to control his inner beast, the defense will require two warriors for it to be successful. Broken Mountain will not let you and his brother shoulder all of the burden, however, and he informs you that he will aid you with what limited healing magicks he has at his disposal. Speak with Curious Gorge for further details of the defensive operation.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_01<tab>Les tocsins ont sonné à Port-aux-Ales, indiquant que les Sahuagins s'étaient mis en marche. Broken Mountain a décidé de vous accompagner pour vous prêter main-forte, et aussi pour surveiller son frère dont la condition reste incertaine. Retrouvez Curious Gorge et parlez-lui.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_02<tab>The three burly Roegadyn fighters are ready to depart for the decisive battle. Wheiskaet informs you that the Sahagin plan to use massive seabeasts to overrun the tidegate, and that he will be joining you despite the wounds he suffered in his fight with the primal Titan. Curious Gorge, still overcome with self-doubt, asks you to once again dispel the fear from his heart with an inspiring /slap to the face.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_02<tab>Les Sahuagins se sont rassemblés près des barrages de la vallée du Crâne. Curious Gorge est par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement inquiet car son frère et Wheiskaet seront avec lui sur le champ de bataille. Il craint de les blesser si jamais sa bête intérieure prend le dessus... Aidez-le à réveiller son instinct de guerrier en lui mettant une <var 1A 02 /var>claque<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_03<tab>Your slap serves to rouse Curious Gorge's inner beast even more so than his fight with the kobolds, restoring his confidence and preparing him for his fight against the Sahagin threat. With a newfound courage, he rushes to Camp Skull Valley─follow him and speak with Storm Commander Falkbryda to receive a briefing on your critical mission.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez donné une claque à Curious Gorge qui a retrouvé ses esprits. Allez au camp de la vallée du Crâne, dans la Noscea occidentale, et parlez à la commandante Falkbryda.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_04<tab>Your allies are all waiting at the southern gate for the fury of the Sahagin. Speak with Storm Marshal Eynzahr to start the desperate battle.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez rejoint vos camarades et parlé à Falkbryda. La commandante vous a fait comprendre que ses effectifs étaient insuffisants et que votre présence était cruciale pour la réussite de la mission. Alors que vous vous apprêtiez à prendre position vers le barrage du sud, le grand maréchal Slafyrsyn est venu se joindre à votre unité à la surprise générale. Allez à l'endroit indiqué et parlez à Eynzahr Slafyrsyn.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_05<tab>The Sahagin come in waves, one after the other, only to be cut down like fish to the slaughter. Curious Gorge fights at a fever pitch, eventually falling to the ground in a struggle to control his inner beast. In the last desperate moment, he triumphantly quells the rising fury of his inner beast, at last conquering it for good. Then, in a futile attempt to break through the tidegate's mighty defenders, the Sahagin captain attacks with his massive seabeast, but they fall quickly before the full strength of two unbridled warriors. With the Sahagin threat finally quelled, speak with Curious Gorge to celebrate this tremendous victory together.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez vaincu tous les ennemis et réussi à protéger le barrage du sud. Votre mission est à présent terminée. Parlez à Curious Gorge pour connaître ses impressions.

source:
TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_06<tab>Curious Gorge and his brother are ecstatic that the former was able to finally tame his inner beast, but that is not the only good news waiting for them. With the Sahagin threat quelled, Storm Marshal Eynzahr informs them that the Maelstrom will move forward with its plan to train its troops in the way of the warrior, and that Maelstrom Command has requested that the two brothers be the first two to teach the fledgling warriors. Little by little, the dream that they carried down with them from their humble mountain village will come to pass, as more people of Eorzea learn the teachings of their ancestors. Curious Gorge, fueled by his new confidence, swears that he will master the techniques of eld, and promises a fearsome duel once you both reach the peak of your martial prowess. Take care not to neglect your training, lest one day Curious Gorge become the mightiest warrior in Eorzea.

※The next warrior quest will be available from Curious Gorge once you have completed the main scenario quest “The Far Edge of Fate.”
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SEQ_06<tab>Ce fut laborieux, mais Curious Gorge est désormais un guerrier accompli. Tous les deux, vous avez montré au grand maréchal le potentiel remarquable des guerriers et ainsi dissipé ses doutes quant à leur fiabilité sur le champ de bataille. Eynzahr Slafyrsyn a d'ailleurs proposé aux deux frères de rejoindre le Maelstrom en tant qu'instructeurs afin d'enseigner leurs techniques de combat aux recrues qui incorporeront son unité spéciale. Leur rêve est sur le point de se réaliser, et vous y avez beaucoup contribué. Vous pouvez être fi<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de vous<var 1D /var>!

* Il est nécessaire de terminer la quête de l'épopée “Aux confins du destin” pour commencer une nouvelle quête de guerrier auprès de Curious Gorge.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Curious Gorge.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Curious Gorge

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_TODO_01<tab>Rouse Curious Gorge with a /slap.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_TODO_01<tab>Donner une <var 1A 02 /var>/claque<var 1A 01 /var> à Curious Gorge

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Falkbryda at Camp Skull Valley.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_TODO_02<tab>Parler à Falkbryda, au camp de la vallée du Crâne

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Eynzahr at South Tidegate.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_TODO_03<tab>Parler à Eynzahr Slafyrsyn, près du barrage du sud

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Curious Gorge.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_TODO_04<tab>Parler à Curious Gorge

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the Sahagin forces have begun marching upon the tidegates. The time has come for the decisive battle, on which the fate of all Lominsans hangs in the balance.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_000<tab>Tu ne pouvais pas mieux tomber, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Je viens d'apprendre que les tocsins venaient de sonner à Port-aux-Ales. Les Sahuagins se sont mis en marche<var 1D /var>! Curious Gorge et toi devez vous préparer à intervenir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_001<tab>My brother still wrestles with his tenuous grasp on the inner beast, but this crisis will not wait for him. The successful defense of the tidegates depends on <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var> warriors being present.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_001<tab>Mon frère n'est pas au mieux de sa forme, mais nous devrons faire avec. J'espère juste qu'il arrivera à contenir sa bête intérieure... En tout cas, je serai là pour l'observer et lui prodiguer des conseils.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_002<tab>I shall not stand idly by, either. I will lend what meager aid I can with my healing magicks. If your heart is steeled for battle, let us meet my brother outside.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_002<tab>Oui, tu as bien entendu<var 1D /var>: je vais vous accompagner et participer à la mission avec vous. Je ne suis pas le meilleur arcaniste du pays, mais je ferai de mon mieux pour vous assister pendant votre combat.

Bien, allons retrouver mon frère et messire Wheiskaet.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_009<tab>I cannot stand by idly during so monumental a battle. Let us go meet Wheiskaet and my brother.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_009<tab>J'ai dû insister pour qu'on me laisse participer à cette mission.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_009<tab>The Sahagin have begun their attack. There is much to discuss at Camp Bronze Lake.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_009<tab>Y paraît qu'les Sahuagins se sont mis en marche<var 1D /var>! Tu devrais aller voir mon frangin, au camp du lac d'Airain, il a p't-être plus d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions à ce sujet.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_009<tab>The decisive battle is at hand. Go to Camp Bronze Lake so we can begin planning at once.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_009<tab>J'ai des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions à propos des Sahuagins. Je te propose de parler de tout ça avec Curious Gorge et Broken Mountain au camp du lac d'Airain.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_010<tab>Whether we like it or not, the fate of Limsa Lominsa depends on us...
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_010<tab>L'heure de la bataille approche. J'espère que tu t'es bien entraîné<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you're here at last. Is my brother ready to depart?
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_010<tab>Salut<var 1D /var>! Bah, t'es tout<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> seul<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!? J'croyais que mon frangin allait venir avec nous...

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_011<tab>My preparations are complete. I am ready to lay down my life in Limsa Lominsa's defense.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_011<tab>Désolé pour le retard, je retrouvais plus mon grimoire.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_012<tab>As are we all. The most recent reports tell that the Sahagin plan to use their massive seabeasts to overrun the tidegates.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_012<tab>Puisque tout le monde est là, je vais vous dire ce que je sais. Aux dernières nouvelles, les Sahuagins seraient en train de se regrouper près des barrages de la vallée du Crâne. Des éclaireurs disent les avoir vus accompagnés de monstres marins.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_013<tab>Us four will be in charge of defending the southern tidegate. With two warriors by our side, we'll beat those slimy fishbacks into the muddy depths from whence they came!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_013<tab>Tous les quatre, nous allons défendre le barrage du sud. C'est une grande res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té qui nous a été confiée, et je compte par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement sur vous deux pour réduire les effectifs de l'armée sahuagine<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_015<tab>You're fighting too!? But what of your wounds? And you said <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var> warriors...?
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_015<tab>Q-quoi<var 1D /var>? Vous allez vous battre avec nous<var 1D /var>!? Mais vos blessures...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_016<tab>Aye, it's true the injuries from our fight with Titan remain, but I reckon the Sahagin's courage won't last for long. As for the warriors... Well, we've got two right here, don't we?
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_016<tab>Titan m'a broyé la colonne, mais ce n'est pas ça qui va m'empêcher de casser de l'homme-poiscaille<var 1D /var>! Et puis vous serez là pour couvrir mes arrières, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_018<tab>Worry not, Wheiskaet, the Sahagin will rue the day they stood before our might!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_018<tab>Si vous vous inquiétez pour messire Wheiskaet, vous n'avez qu'à tuer tous les Sahuagins avant lui<var 1D /var>; comme ça, le problème est réglé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_019<tab>Alright, then, let's head to Camp Skull Valley─the Sahagin won't soon forget this battle!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_019<tab>Sur ce, mes amis, mettons-nous en route. Direction le camp de la vallée du Crâne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_020<tab>...The fate of Limsa Lominsa... I desire nothing more than to see everyone safely through this battle, but if the beast within takes me within its clutches again...
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_020<tab>Ça m'inquiète de devoir me battre sans être sûr que j'suis capable de contrôler ma bête intérieure... Si jamais y vous arrivait quelque chose par ma faute, je me l'pardonnerais jamais.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_021<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you know what to do! Gather your strength and drive the fear from me with a mighty <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>slap<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>! It's time to put that training to work!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_021<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Aide-moi à réveiller mes instincts de guerrier<var 1D /var>! Donne-moi une <var 1A 02 /var>claque<var 1A 01 /var> comme la dernière fois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_029<tab>Use your fighting spirit to guide my brother through his fog of doubt.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_029<tab>Mon frère a besoin de toi pour partir au combat le cœur vaillant.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_029<tab>I'll be at Camp Bronze Lake preparing for the battle against the Sahagin.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_029<tab>J'suis passé ici pour récupérer un truc. On s'retrouve au camp du lac d'Airain, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_029<tab>Everything depends on the outcome of this battle. Show the realm what warriors are made of!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_029<tab>Il faut à tout prix que nous remportions cette bataille. Les Sahuagins ne souilleront pas Limsa Lominsa de leurs sales nageoires<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_030<tab>Don't hold back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Slap me silly like only a warrior can!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_030<tab>Qu'est-ce que tu fais<var 1D /var>? J'ai besoin que tu m'donnes une <var 1A 02 /var>claque<var 1A 01 /var> pour me donner du courage, pas qu'tu fasses je-sais-pas-quoi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_032<tab>That's the stuff, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'll be feeling that in the morning!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_032<tab>Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. J'y vois plus clair à présent. J'vais tout donner pour protéger mes camarades et le barrage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_033<tab>Come hells or high water, the tidegates will not fall! We'll show the Sahagin the iron will of the warrior! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, let us report to Commander Falkbryda at once!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_033<tab>Assez perdu d'temps comme ça<var 1D /var>! Allons dans la Noscea occidentale<var 1D /var>; la commandante Falkbryda doit nous attendre avec impatience<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_039<tab>Your presence makes me proud to call myself a warrior! With us at the front lines, the fishbacks won't make it one yalm past the shore!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_039<tab>J'suis gonflé à bloc<var 1D /var>! J'ai hâte qu'on aille buter ces foutus barbares<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_040<tab>The Sahagin won't get one ilm past the tidegates with us standing in their way!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_040<tab>La commandante Falkbryda doit nous attendre avec impatience. Allons vite au camp de la vallée du Crâne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_039<tab>Curious Gorge seems like a warrior reborn. With you two by our side, Limsa Lominsa has nothing to fear.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_039<tab>On dirait bien que Curious Gorge a retrouvé la confiance qui lui faisait défaut ces derniers temps. Voilà qui est bon signe pour le combat qui vient<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_039<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_039<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_040<tab>My brother's confidence has returned at last, thanks to your splendid example.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_040<tab>Curious Gorge a retrouvé sa détermination, je le vois dans ses yeux. Tu as su raviver la flamme qui s'était éteinte dans son cœur.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_FALKBRYDA_000_040<tab>This operation depends on the successful defense of both tidegates. You four will see to the southern, while another unit attends to the northern. Although you are few in number, 'twould be foolish to expect anything but greatness from such storied fighters.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_FALKBRYDA_000_040<tab>Merci d'être venus nous prêter main-forte. Vous allez vous joindre à l'unité chargée de protéger le barrage sud. Je ne vais pas vous mentir, les effectifs sont très peu nombreux<var 1D /var>; votre présence est donc cruciale pour la réussite de la mission.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_041<tab>All in charge of defending the southern tidegate are here. Let's not waste any more time!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_041<tab>Message reçu cinq sur cinq. En avant, les gars<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_042<tab>Not so fast, Wheiskaet. You don't think I'd let you take all the glory, do you?
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_042<tab>(-???-)J'ai l'impression qu'une paire de bras sup<var 16 /var>plé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>re serait la bienvenue au sein de cette équipe<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_043<tab>Storm Marshal Eynzahr!? You plan to fight alongside us?
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_043<tab>M-messire Slafyrsyn<var 1D /var>!? Mais que faites-vous ici<var 1D /var>? Ne... Ne me dites pas que vous avez l'intention d'affronter les Sahuagins<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_FALKBRYDA_000_044<tab>There was naught I could say to stop him. Once he has a mind to do something, there is very little that can...
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_FALKBRYDA_000_044<tab>Nous avons essayé de l'en dissuader, mais notre grand maréchal est plus têtu qu'une mule...

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_045<tab>My sense of duty will scarce allow you four to bear the weight of Limsa Lominsa's fate on your own. My axe will be the first to greet the Sahagin wave!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_045<tab>Je n'allais tout de même pas rester les bras croisés dans mon bureau alors que l'avenir de la cité est en jeu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_046<tab>And what's more, I'd like to see the strength of these two warriors with mine own eyes. Something tells me this will be a fight to remember!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_046<tab>Et puis ce sera pour moi l'occasion d'observer de près ces deux guerriers dont on m'a tant vanté les prouesses.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_047<tab>Storm Marshal, it will be an honor to fight by your side! Our axes will see the people of Limsa Lominsa safely through this storm!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_047<tab>Nous ne vous décevrons pas, Grand maréchal<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> et moi protégerons le barrage au péril de nos vies s'il le faut<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_048<tab>Brave defenders! This day, the Sahagin mean to descend upon us like a tidal wave! But you will stand strong! You will not allow the fishbacks a single ilm of land, nor will you give them any quarter!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_048<tab>Voilà qui fait plaisir à entendre<var 1D /var>! Toutefois, il serait dommage d'en arriver à de telles extrémités. Nous lutterons tous ensemble, et nous rentrerons tous ensemble<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_049<tab>Our fate awaits us at Halfstone! To the tidegate!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_049<tab>Allons-y, mes amis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_FALKBRYDA_000_050<tab>The fate of Limsa Lominsa is safe in your hands. May you return victorious!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_FALKBRYDA_000_050<tab>Le destin de Limsa Lominsa est entre vos mains. Je vous souhaite bonne chance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_049<tab>Your strength has served to inspire mine, and now <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> strength will stand in between Limsa Lominsa and the Sahagin menace. Hurry to Halfstone before they attack!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_049<tab>Les Limséens peuvent dormir sur leurs deux oreilles. J'exterminerai tous les Sahuagins qui s'ap<var 16 /var>pro<var 16 /var>che<var 16 /var>ront du barrage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_050<tab>We shall show Eorzea a warrior's true mettle. May our axes remain steadfast and true!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_050<tab>Les Limséens peuvent dormir sur leurs deux oreilles. J'exterminerai tous les Sahuagins qui s'ap<var 16 /var>pro<var 16 /var>che<var 16 /var>ront du barrage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_050<tab>To see the storm marshal in battle... The Maelstrom is sparing no effort in this endeavor. May the Twelve give us luck!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_050<tab>La présence du grand maréchal Slafyrsyn est une chance pour vous deux. Vous allez pouvoir lui montrer à quel point les guerriers sont efficaces sur le champ de bataille.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_049<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_049<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_050<tab>The responsibility we bear is not to be taken lightly. The citizens of Limsa Lominsa shall not regret putting their trust in us!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_050<tab>Il y a beaucoup de pression sur nos épaules... Nous devons nous transcender pour accomplir notre mission et répondre aux attentes des Limséens<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_050<tab>Valiant protectors of Limsa Lominsa! This day, the Sahagin mean to make an end of us. They will come shrieking like the gale, and descend upon us with the force of a tidal wave! But will we falter? No! We will stand strong, unwavering, until the tide recedes, stained by the blood of their dead!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_050<tab>Vaillants soldats<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes à l'image des valeurs que vous défendez<var 1D /var>: forts et courageux<var 1D /var>! Avancez vers l'impitoyable ennemi de la patrie, et détruisez-le<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_051<tab>The beast...has been tamed. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Brother, friends...thank you.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_051<tab>J... J'ai réussi... J'ai enfin dompté ma bête intérieure...

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_052<tab>My axe remains steadfast! Friends, stand at my back─my inner beast shall protect you!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_052<tab>J'ai fini par comprendre que c'était le désir de protéger les autres qui faisait notre force<var 1D /var>! Cette volonté de défendre les plus faibles déchaîne notre bête intérieure et nous rend invulnérables<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_053<tab>Haha, the fishbacks have brought more pets to be crushed under the warriors' heels!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_053<tab>Si c'est pas mignon ça... Le général et son toutou adoré qui font leur petite promenade <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((du soir)) ((matinale)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((de l'après-midi)) ((du soir)) /var>)) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_054<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Brother! Imbue your axes with your inner fury, and show the world a warrior's true wrath!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_054<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Curious Gorge<var 1D /var>! Montrez-leur la toute-puissance des guerriers<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_055<tab>Go forward, undaunted warriors! Smash these invaders till naught remains but fodder for the gulls!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_055<tab>Mes amis, je n'aurai qu'une chose à dire<var 1D /var>: à l'attaque<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Decimate the Sahagin forces!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Éliminez tous les ennemis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_BATTLETALK_00<tab>Defend the tidegate and use the fishbacks' broken corpses as bait!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_BATTLETALK_00<tab>Aucun Sahuagin ne doit passer ce barrage<var 1D /var>!
Ne leur montrez aucune pitié<var 1D /var>! Tuez-les tous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_01<tab>You call that an axe!?
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_01<tab>J'vais vous montrer de quoi j'suis capable<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Mwahaha! You're not worthy of tasting my steel!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Mwah ha ha ha<var 1D /var>! Je sens la force monter en moi<var 1D /var>!
Amenez-vous, bande d'asticots<var 1D /var>! V'nez bouffer ma hache<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_WHEISKAET_BATTLETALK_01<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Curious Gorge! Skewer the fishbacks!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_WHEISKAET_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Vous faites du bon boulot, tous les deux<var 1D /var>!
Continuez comme ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_03<tab>Graaagh! Die! Choke on your dead!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_03<tab>WaaAaAAAARrrRRH<var 1D /var>!!! J'vais tous vous crever<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_BROKENMOUNTAIN_BATTLETALK_02<tab>My brother, he's...losing control! The beast threatens to swallow him whole!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_BROKENMOUNTAIN_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Curious Gorge y va trop fort<var 1D /var>!
Sa bête intérieure est en train de prendre le dessus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_04<tab>Tremble before me...weaklings!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_04<tab>GRRROooOOAAAaAAARRRrR<var 1D /var>!!
RIEN NE PEUT M'ARRÊTER<var 1D /var>!!!!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_LB_01<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I'll take care of the captain! Fell the trifling beast!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_LB_01<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! J'te laisse t'occuper de la créature<var 1D /var>!
Moi, j'vais distraire le Sahuagin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_LB_02<tab>As long as <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> stands with us, none shall break through!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_LB_02<tab>Y peuvent bien essayer d'nous attaquer<var 1D /var>!
Toi et moi, on est invincibles<var 1D /var>! Ha ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>I must...withdraw...
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Argh<var 1D /var>! C'en est fini pour moi...
Mes blessures sont trop importantes pour continuer.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_WHEISKAET_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Godsdammit...go on without me...
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_WHEISKAET_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Je me suis fait avoir... Continuez sans moi, les amis.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_BROKENMOUNTAIN_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>The Sahagin are too fierce... We must pull back...
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_BROKENMOUNTAIN_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>J'en peux plus... J-je dois vous laisser...

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Gaaagh... I can't... It's over...
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_CURIOUSGORGE_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>J'me suis trop enflammé, on dirait...
À toi de jouer, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_BATTLETALK_WIN<tab>Finish off the Sahagin captain!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_QIB_001_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_BATTLETALK_WIN<tab>La victoire est à nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_060<tab>The Sahagin have been beaten back! Limsa Lominsa is saved! Let's meet at the southern gate to celebrate our victory!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_060<tab>On a réussi à protéger Limsa Lominsa<var 1D /var>! J'crois qu'on peut être fiers de c'qu'on a accompli<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_061<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_061<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_060<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_060<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_061<tab>To see you and my brother fight unbridled gave me strength I did not know I had. No doubt our victory here is thanks to you.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_061<tab>Le simple fait de vous voir combattre, toi et mon frère, m'a com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment transcendé<var 1D /var>! J'étais comme un autre homme<var 1D /var>! Cette victoire, nous vous la devons<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_060<tab>If not for you two warriors, the tidegate would surely have fallen. Let's return to the southern tidegate to celebrate our victory.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_060<tab>Les Limséens vous doivent une fière chandelle, à toi et à Curious Gorge. Ce sont vos techniques de guerrier qui ont sauvé leur cité.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_061<tab>The full strength of a warrior is truly a sight to behold. The Sahagin won't soon forget today's battle!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_061<tab>Curious Gorge et toi nous avez fait une belle dé<var 16 /var>mon<var 16 /var>stra<var 16 /var>tion de vos talents. Nous n'aurions jamais pu remporter cette bataille sans vos techniques de guerrier. Vous pouvez être fiers de vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_060<tab>Warrior of Light, the tales do not do you justice. It's been too long since I've swung my axe as I did today.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_060<tab>Ce fut un honneur de lutter à vos côtés, Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière. Il y avait bien longtemps que je ne m'étais pas battu aussi farouchement<var 1D /var>! Ha ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_063<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_063<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_064<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_064<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_070<tab>Warrior of Light, Curious Gorge! The battle is won, and the Sahagin scurry back to their moldy caverns!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_070<tab>Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière, Curious Gorge, vous pouvez être fiers de vous<var 1D /var>! Vous avez non seulement protégé nos vies, mais aussi toutes celles des personnes de l'autre côté du barrage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_071<tab>Today's victory is owed to the might of our two warriors! Without you, we would not be standing here.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_071<tab>Cette victoire, ce n'est pas celle du Maelstrom mais bel et bien celle des guerriers<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_072<tab>Curious Gorge, wear the title of warrior with pride!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_072<tab>Il semblerait que tu aies enfin réussi à dompter ta bête intérieure.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_073<tab>I couldn't have made it this far alone. It was only thanks to the bravery of my allies that I was able to dominate the beast within.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_073<tab>Oui, mais j'y serais jamais arrivé sans votre aide à tous<var 1D /var>! J'ai compris que c'était le désir de protéger ses compagnons qui permettait d'garder le contrôle de soi.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_074<tab>The day will soon come when, with proper training and instruction, all the peoples of Eorzea can choose to walk the path of the warrior.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_074<tab>C'est un grand jour pour les guerriers. Nos techniques de combat ne pourront plus être critiquées ou considérées comme dangereuses. Nous allons pouvoir diffuser notre savoir en Éorzéa<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_075<tab>Speaking of which, with the Sahagin threat dealt with, the Maelstrom can proceed with its plan to train its troops in the way of the warriors. And who better to train them than the two siblings who brought their teachings to Eorzea in the first place?
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_075<tab>C'est une formidable nouvelle, tant pour vous que pour moi. Il y a longtemps que le Maelstrom rêve de créer une unité formée exclusivement de guerriers.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_076<tab>Curious Gorge, Broken Mountain, I invite you to instruct the Maelstrom recruits in the ways of your ancestors. Forge our troops into mighty defenders worthy of their title!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_076<tab>Curious Gorge, Broken Mountain, que diriez-vous de rejoindre l'armée de Limsa Lominsa<var 1D /var>? Nous recrutons justement des instructeurs, en ce moment.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_077<tab>Many moons have passed since we came down from our mountain village, and finally we can begin to realize our dream!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_077<tab>J'suis tellement content... Mon rêve va enfin s'réaliser...

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_078<tab>I... This is an honor. My brother and I will gladly accept this appointment!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_078<tab>Messire Slafyrsyn, nous acceptons votre proposition avec grand plaisir.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_079<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, mayhap now <var 1A 02 /var>you're<var 1A 01 /var> the one who needs to start training harder!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_079<tab>Ça aura pris du temps, mais j'me suis rapproché de ton niveau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_090<tab>I daresay you're right─<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has some proper competition!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_WHEISKAET_000_090<tab>De ce que j'en ai vu, tu as fait jeu égal avec <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. En tout cas, je pense que vous avez encore une belle marge de progression, tous les deux.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_091<tab>We'll both fight where we're needed, unbound by fear or hesitation, and in doing so master the techniques of eld!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_091<tab>Messire Wheiskaet a raison<var 1D /var>! J'suis sûr qu'on peut encore s'améliorer et per<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>ner nos techniques<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_092<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, look forward to the day we both reach the peak of our strengths, for then you'll face an opponent worthy of your axe: me!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_CURIOUSGORGE_000_092<tab>Compte sur moi pour m'entraîner comme un forcené<var 1D /var>! Quand j'serai prêt, je te défierai en duel, et là, on verra lequel de nous deux est le plus balèze<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>This concludes the warrior quests for FINAL FANTASY XIV: Heavensward. In order to undertake the next series of quests, you must first meet the following requirements:
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>Vous venez de parvenir à une étape dans la trame des quêtes de guerrier. Vous pourrez poursuivre cette histoire si vous remplissez les conditions suivantes.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SYSTEM_000_501<tab>※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “The Far Edge of Fate.”
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SYSTEM_000_501<tab>Il est nécessaire de terminer la quête de l'épopée “Aux confins du destin” pour poursuivre cette histoire.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SYSTEM_000_502<tab>Once you have done so, the next warrior quest will be available from Curious Gorge.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR600_00601_SYSTEM_000_502<tab>Il vous suffira ensuite de vous adresser à Curious Gorge, à la Chute cachée, afin de commencer une nouvelle quête pour ce job.
